content.question: The overall trend in African American migration depicted on the graph most directly contributed to the

choices.label: spread of the youth counterculture nationwide
expansion of a new interstate highway system throughout the country
fragmentation of culture throughout the United States
White resistance to integrated communities in the North

content.answer: White resistance to integrated communities in the North

topic.text: 8.10: The African American Civil Rights Movement (1960s)

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
